text: We’re excited to introduce our 2nd year group project – Musicia: A Music Event Management & Ticket Selling Platform tailored for Sri Lanka! � Developed using the PHP MVC architecture, Musicia was built to address the common challenges faced by music event organizers, performers, and service providers—such as scattered communication, low event visibility, and ticketing inefficiencies. Our platform brings all key stakeholders together, offering a streamlined, end-to-end solution for planning, promoting, managing, and analyzing music events. Through Musicia, we aim to build a vibrant, connected ecosystem for Sri Lanka’s music community!
key_features: Online ticket sales with QR code generation and email delivery
Digital ticket downloads and in-platform notifications
Seamless collaboration through messaging system between organizers, performers & service providers
Comprehensive report generation for events, admins, and profit tracking

text:
Introducing Foodies – Your Ultimate Online Food Ordering System!

Foodies is a cutting-edge platform designed to revolutionize the way you order food online. Whether you're craving a quick snack or planning a feast, Foodies connects you with your favorite restaurants effortlessly.
key_features: Seamless Food Ordering: Explore menus, place orders, and enjoy your favorite meals in no time
Flexible Restaurant Management: Tailored tools for restaurants to manage menus, orders, and customer feedback
Efficient User Profiles: Personalized experiences for every user, whether you're a diner or a restaurant owner
Secure Payment System: Safe and reliable payment options for hassle-free transactions
Real-Time Order Tracking: Stay updated on the status of your order from preparation to delivery

text:
Introducing EduTrack - A Learning Management System for Sri Lankan Schools!

EduTrack revolutionizes classroom management with digital attendance, grade tracking, and parent-teacher communication all in one platform.
key_features: Digital attendance system with facial recognition

text:
Presenting AgriGo - Digital Platform for Sri Lankan Farmers!

Connecting farmers directly with buyers, providing weather alerts, crop advice, and market price information to empower Sri Lanka's agricultural community.

Meet HealthPlus - Telemedicine Platform for Sri Lanka!

Bridging patients with doctors through video consultations, e-prescriptions, and medicine delivery services across the island.

Introducing Tourista - Sri Lanka's Smart Travel Companion!

An all-in-one tourism app offering personalized itineraries, local guides, and real-time translation for foreign visitors.

Presenting EcoTrack - Waste Management Solution for Smart Cities!

Optimizing garbage collection routes using IoT sensors and analytics to make Sri Lankan cities cleaner and greener.

Meet JobLink - Career Platform for Sri Lankan Professionals!

Connecting job seekers with employers through AI-powered matching, skill assessments, and virtual career fairs.

Introducing HandyGo - On-Demand Service Marketplace!

Connecting customers with skilled professionals for everything from plumbing to IT support across Sri Lanka.

Presenting SmartBus - Public Transport Revolution!

Real-time bus tracking, digital ticketing, and crowd prediction for Sri Lanka's public transportation system.

Meet LocalMart - Digital Platform for Sri Lankan Small Businesses!

Helping neighborhood shops go digital with inventory management, online ordering, and delivery coordination.

Introducing PetCare - Veterinary Services Platform!

Connecting pet owners with vets for online consultations, medication delivery, and emergency services island-wide.
